message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. How about a slightly more even split this time? 55/45?
Come on, Bob! Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is as fair as it gets!
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time.  52/48 - it's a good deal before inflation eats more of the pie!
Don't try to rush me, Bob! 57-43 is the most I can compromise.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
